attributes.action: GIVE FREE TICKETS TO THE 2012 OLYMPICS FOR LONDON TAX PAYERS!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: LONDONERS ARE PAYING FOR THE 2012 OLYMPICS WITH NO SAY OR CHOICE! SO ITS ONLY FAIR THEY GIVE US SOMETHING BACK AND GIVE US ALL (LONDONERS) FREE TICKETS FOR THE OLYMPICS IN 2012.

rejection.details: Please resubmit with the proper use of capital letters. It's quite hard to read at the moment.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
